website_summaries.verdict: This 6-bowl set has more bowls and a larger range of sizes than others.
pros: Set comes with more bowls than other sets
Nice interior shine on the finish
Rim on the bowls offers a good size for grip
Cheap on price but not quality
cons: Unlike many other stainless steel bowl sets, this one doesn't come with lids

customer_reviews.title: fast shipping and great packing. And for the bowls
customer_reviews.text: Got my mixing bowls today, as always, fast shipping and great packing. And for the bowls, I must say the design is very simple and elegant, cheap on the price but not on the quality. well done ZESPROKA.
customer_reviews.author: yo yo

customer_reviews.title: Bowl set is very cheap and feels like tin.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bowl set for my daughter for Christmas and as soon as I opened the box I could see that it was going back. It had little black specks that I couldn't get off and the set is smaller than it looks on the pictures. The bowls feel cheap and I could see that they would dent very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Brent C

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these Stainless Steel Mixing Bowls! Having lids that fit tight is wonderful! I find that I am using these bowls for something nearly every day. They are easy to store and easy to use. The non slip base truly keeps the bowl in place as it is being used. They are a good sturdy weight and look nice enough to serve from. Because they are so handy, each of my daughters purchased a set for themselves! I highly recommend these bowls. The set is perfect for weddings, house warmings, or just because. You definitely can't go wrong with this product!
customer_reviews.author: CJH

customer_reviews.title: I made a batch of Texas Caviar in the second ...
customer_reviews.text: I made a batch of Texas Caviar in the second to largest bowl. I used a metal spoon and it scratched the mirrored surface after 1 use.
customer_reviews.author: bill bailey

customer_reviews.title: We love our bowls
customer_reviews.text: We love our bowls! They stand well through the dishwasher and the sizes given are great! The biggest bowl is a large bowl... Sometimes when I order dishes online they end up being a lot smaller then expected. These are absolutely perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Faulty quality control
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set once before and loved it so I didn’t hesitate to order it again when I needed bowls for our vacation home. Unfortunately this time one of the bowls is defective — the rim is split and could be a danger, cutting the handler (see photos). I decided not to go through the hassle of returning the set. So I haven’t given the manufacturer a chance to remedy the problem. But nothing can replace good quality control!
customer_reviews.author: dozamom

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: These bowls make food prep a breeze. Plenty of sizes for various needs. They’re light weight and easy to clean, and they stack nicely for easy storage. I’ve had them for over a year and they still work great. Would absolutely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice bowls for household use.
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality stainless steel bowls. While not as thick as another set I have, these are perfectly adequate for household use. The fact that you get 6 bowls for a great price is a good value. I bought these because we simply need more bowls on complex projects. I like stainless as it is durable and easy to close. These are a good price/value overall.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J. Cascioppo

customer_reviews.title: All lids not functional.
customer_reviews.text: When I needed the bowls for an occasion I was disappointed that two of the lids were too large to snugly seal the contents of the bowl defeating the purpose of these bowls. The bowls are nicely constructed with rubber bases convenient when whisking wet and dry ingredients and the bowls remain stationary for mixing. That feature, though, prevents an easy slide when refrigerating items on a glass shelving..
customer_reviews.author: MTFenster

customer_reviews.title: Professional tools at an amateur price!
customer_reviews.text: The day these arrived I threw out all my old plastic bowls and seriously did some cupboard cleaning! Now, instead of a mess, my cupboards are looking great and have more space. And the bowls? They're lightweight, sturdy, and I'll probably never need to buy another bowl for my kitchen. And THAT makes this chef HAPPY!!!
customer_reviews.author: daniel coates

customer_reviews.title: Best
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because they were a decent price and I was tired of using plastics and anything else I could find to hold my raw meats etc when prepping. I'm so glad I bought these. They are durable, easy to clean and they look expensive. The material and simple style is great! Would definitely buy again. The stack within each other which makes them easy to store and fit anywhere!! Big plus. The size options are a great steal as well. Do buy!
customer_reviews.author: Shainice L.

customer_reviews.title: Shape of bowls prevent batter fling
customer_reviews.text: 6 bowls. I like the stackable part also shape of the bowls are great! No flinging batter out of bowl. Love em
customer_reviews.author: jimmy r jamison

customer_reviews.title: Huge disappointment in a less than 2 years
customer_reviews.text: After very little use and a little over a year, all of these bowls have little specks where they have rusted both inside & the underneath of them. As soon as I had gotten them they just didn't feel like the "good" kind, but figured they'd be ok. So disappointed in them
customer_reviews.author: TonyaK

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: These bowls are nice quality. They are easy to clean, however they leave a lot of water sports behind which can make them look dirty when they actually aren't. I'm happy with them though
customer_reviews.author: Jalena

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I had one bowl that was metal and loved it. I kept saying I wanted to get new ones to replace my plastic bowls. I kept saying more and more. My hubby told me to get them and get rid of the plastic bowls. I have had them for 20 years. Not like they got a lot of great use. So happy I did. The metal ones are so much better and fit so much better in our cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Good fun

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for a year now and I use them almost daily. They haven't shown any signs of wear and tear yet and should last me several more years!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: The most important part to me is the grip.
customer_reviews.text: I love these mixing bowls. Not only do they look great, but they are also easy to hold on to and that was a concern of mine when I was trying to decide which bowls to get. I was very happy to see that I was able to have a good grip and it was comfortable as well. Also another plus is that they are easy to clean. I'm very happy with these bowls.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and perfect
customer_reviews.text: I used glass nested mixing bowls which I love for the glass properties. But they are soooo heavy. These are perfect for one handed holding for mixing, pouring, moving.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Great set of bowls!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these bowls. They're quite attractive as far as bowls go, and I REALLY like how little room they take compared to the typical mixing bowl set. I also like that the bowls are deeper and less "flat" as it's less likely that there will be splatters when using an electric mixer. I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jane K.

customer_reviews.title: Lively Kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Just the thing for the lively kitchen. Large projects - no problem. Small stuff - not and issue. Just choose the size you need and let your daughter-in-law use the one she needs without fighting over it.
customer_reviews.author: Reader

customer_reviews.title: useful
customer_reviews.text: Like them, only minor complaint -- it does get scratched. Only used for a month or so, so we will see how it stands up to long term use.
customer_reviews.author: RealPro

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: These get the job done. I put stuff in and mix it. They are starting to "stain" a little. Little brown spots. But not a lot. I would buy them again. their mixing bowls. What do you want?
customer_reviews.author: Dakid

customer_reviews.title: Thin walled though very light weight.
customer_reviews.text: These are thinner and lighter weight than similar ones I've purchased from other sources. If you want something very light weight, these are good. If you are looking for something thicker and more durable, you may not be pleased with these.
customer_reviews.author: ThereseTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This set replaces an older painted set that needed to go. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: markp

customer_reviews.title: Love these bowls!
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't be without these. Love these bowls. Use them every day.
customer_reviews.author: Bev

customer_reviews.title: Weight
customer_reviews.text: Every size I need. They nest perfectly which saves room. Just the right weight. My other bowls were heavier when they were empty so they were really heavy when the larger bowls were full.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Gatch

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, light weight and good rim
customer_reviews.text: My wife really likes them. Good quality, light weight and good rim. Will probably get another set for a cabin.
customer_reviews.author: Jeo

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bowls
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bowls! Perfect home warming gift. I'm sure they will get a lot of use.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Wish they had lids
customer_reviews.text: Have not used the item yet . Looks as though they are made well and will be what I need The only thing is I wish they came with lids
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, functional, and great price!
customer_reviews.text: These are gorgeous, light weight bowls, and a great addition to my kitchen tools. Really nice price point, too!
customer_reviews.author: Sam T.

customer_reviews.title: Good Bowls
customer_reviews.text: I bought these bowls. They are very nice bowls. They stack nice and look great. The only drawback is they don't have any lids. They didn't advertise that they do have lids so it is my fault, but they are very pretty bowls.
customer_reviews.author: SEE III

customer_reviews.title: Best! Nice sizes. Deep bowls. Nice looking.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my new mixing bowls. Every size I need and use. There's no lids but they are all I need. Great choice.
customer_reviews.author: ronder scott

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: This has 6 bowls. All have sloped sides so flour and baking powder doesn't get stuck in the corners. Now I'm able to mix ingredients separately and combine them as I go.
customer_reviews.author: Tim -Illinois

customer_reviews.title: Great Space saver and Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic, heavy duty! Got rid of all my plastic bowls that were warped and cracked! Very Happy!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: A Must Buy for your Kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful mixing bowls! These bowls are a bargain! I love the fact that they are stackable which saves a lot of room. They are high quality stainless steel, packed with care, and lightweight. These are an amazing deal & great quality!
customer_reviews.author: PFFallsChurch

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service-Not a great product
customer_reviews.text: Although it states these are scratch proof and rust proof- they are unfortunately neither. I contacted the seller after 2 months because my product had both scratched and rusted. They were very kind to send replacements. Unfortunately, they scratched almost immediately even though I am careful not to use abrasive items with these. Its ridiculous because they are mixing bowls and I am too scared to even mix in them! They are very pretty bowls but not practical
customer_reviews.author: Kristian

customer_reviews.title: Really nice.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice. Nestles well, they are very pretty. Not too heavy, but works well with mixer. So glad I got them.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny S

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased your nesting mixing bowls, and I am so impressed! It has been many years since I had an assortment of bowls of this quality, and their nesting together is so convenient for storage. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan N. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Stackable
customer_reviews.text: Hard to clean and looks greasy when they are clean but good bowls. Light weight and I like how they stack together.
customer_reviews.author: Customer007

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these, look great, tons of sizes, use them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: TRACY CHILDRESS

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but small.
customer_reviews.text: Returned them because they were small. The largest one was not big enough for a mixing bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Useful
customer_reviews.text: I use these bowls for food prep, but they are pretty enough to use for serving food. I highly recommend this set for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Alison C.

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: simply said, there amazing, i love the sizes, i love the color and look, it makes my kitchen feel professional
customer_reviews.author: colden mitchell

customer_reviews.title: I didn’t know I could be so excited about bowls
customer_reviews.text: Really lightweight and durable. It takes up so little space and it’s so much product for your money. It’s good for it’s purpose yet it’s aesthetically pleasing enough to use as serving bowls. I’m in love!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works like a pro...
customer_reviews.text: These bowls are fantastic. I Love them so much, I don't want to use them. They are really great looking bowls...
customer_reviews.author: Riconn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love that these bowls have a brushed steel look on the outside, but are shiny on the inside.
customer_reviews.author: karyn bretz

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant!
customer_reviews.text: Just beautiful, as our bowls got lost in the move.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to clean and use for my salad mixing and baking needs
customer_reviews.author: Rigo Rosell

customer_reviews.title: Love em
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bowls. A multitude of sizes for any need.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Reid

customer_reviews.title: Nice Nesting Bowls.
customer_reviews.text: The nesting feature is nice. They are thinner than I thought but have been durable so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Did not receive the one shown
customer_reviews.text: Did not have the brand name engraved on any of these bowls as the picture shows.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bowls and so w
customer_reviews.text: These bowls are great!!Made well and easy to clean. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: NonnaLynn

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set of Mixers! 👍
customer_reviews.text: These bowls are nice and deep so you and stir and mix without splashing out of the top. They are sturdy and they stack all together so they only take up the space of one bowl when storing!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great, but scratches fairly easily.
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and exactly what I needed. Not very tall so they fit in a cabinet very easily. Already has a few scratches and seems like it will get blemished pretty easily. Otherwise these are great.
customer_reviews.author: Katie H.

customer_reviews.title: Great for compact storage in a small kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Great set of nesting bowls....just what we needed in our tiny apartment kitchen. Takes up minimal space.
customer_reviews.author: infoseeker

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love these mixing bowls. They are beautiful and the different sizes are perfect! The price was great. I would definitely recommend these mixing bowls.
customer_reviews.author: beverly dronebarger

customer_reviews.title: Great quality bowls
customer_reviews.text: I use these bowls everyday, their sizes are perfect and they're great for baking, cooking and washing fruits and vegetables.
customer_reviews.author: Vera

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money. Just as advertised. Nice looking.
customer_reviews.text: Bowls are just what we needed. Nest nicely, look good. Very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: LVmetal

customer_reviews.title: We have had these for a week or so and I LOVE them. They look great and have handled hand ...
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend and I needed some mixing bowls for all of the cooking we do together. We have had these for a week or so and I LOVE them. They look great and have handled hand washing or dish washing equally as well. Great sizes, and great price. Happy customers.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa

customer_reviews.title: Great product and value.
customer_reviews.text: Lots of sizes and so far they haven’t rusted. I have complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome set! Will be ordering another for my mom for mothers day, she tried to steal mine!
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.text: The bowls looked and arrived exactly as I expected them too. Stack well, easy to clean, really good value
customer_reviews.author: Charles Walters

customer_reviews.title: Scratch easily but so beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed. These are beautiful. They scratch up when you use a hand mixer in them but it ends up creating this crazy cool design, if you don't want to scratch them up, don't use a hand mixer in them.
customer_reviews.author: SydJan92

customer_reviews.title: They still work well and great value for money
customer_reviews.text: In the photo they have an almost purple tinge, in reality they are a regular steel colour. They still work well and great value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I will buy again if I need another set great buy
customer_reviews.author: Richard Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use Product
customer_reviews.text: I love Amcrest cams. They are very easy to use and customer support is always outstanding. Arthur with Amcrest was a wonderful help!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It can be used for anything
customer_reviews.text: I used it in the kitchen for mixing,I love the appearence
customer_reviews.author: Phillip

customer_reviews.title: Space saving design
customer_reviews.text: Decent for saving space. Have held up well to heavy use.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Purchased as a gift
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful and versatile set of bowls, nice quality for the price, love the different sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The size, lightness and yet sturdiness of these bowls are great!
customer_reviews.author: kathy wright

customer_reviews.title: Bowls that are great to have
customer_reviews.text: I don’t have any dislikes with my bowls I liked them so much that I actually ordered a set for my mother
customer_reviews.author: Tina Deem

customer_reviews.title: good sizing, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Like this set of bowls. Good for food preparing and salad making!
customer_reviews.author: waterloo99

customer_reviews.title: Rust noted at edges and bottom of bowl
customer_reviews.text: Serves its purpose well but quickly rusts if you leave it to air dry.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Escalante

customer_reviews.title: Great bowls
customer_reviews.text: These bowls are great. They do exactly as they should, and look good doing it.
customer_reviews.author: Steve w.

customer_reviews.title: Great mixing bowls
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for the wife for Mother's Day, and she loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Love the bowls
customer_reviews.text: Love how many bowls there are and how neatly they store. Have used them several times and they are well balanced.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M. Swayze

customer_reviews.title: The bride to be loved them
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these bowls for a wedding shower and the bride to be loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These bowls are nice but the SS is very thin and light weight. Mine have no leaks!
customer_reviews.author: Cabinmike

customer_reviews.title: very practical
customer_reviews.text: The sizes are great and multi purpose for everything. Lightweight and great!
customer_reviews.author: Gina Levy

customer_reviews.title: Great weight and very useable sizes
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made, good weight, my son the chief loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Very thin, not solid, scratches easily
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed with these - they are very thin and lightweight. Nothing 'solid' about it. Whisking eggs left scratches so I'm now wondering if they are really safe to use in the kitchen at all.
customer_reviews.author: R Body

customer_reviews.title: My daughter said they were quality made and she loved the look of the set
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my daughter for her new house. My daughter said they were quality made and she loved the look of the set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great variation of sizes!!
customer_reviews.text: These bowls are the perfect size for anything you could need!! And they look great too!
customer_reviews.author: Devon Heil

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't have the brand name on the Bowls as shown on the add
customer_reviews.text: My set didn't come with the manufacturer's name on the bowls as shown on the add to tell you the truth is one of the reasons I got this because of the name on the side of the bowls it makes it look more expensive well for me it those lol I'm so disappointed. How I am supposed to know it's from zesproka if it doesn't have the name printed on the bowls I think this are knock offs I want the ones I saw on the add not this with no name they also came with some black stains on some certain spots on the bowls..
customer_reviews.author: Blanco

customer_reviews.title: Polished SS scratches badly and is very thin
customer_reviews.text: These are very thin. They are mirror finish which scratches badly. The insides of mine are crazy scratched from metal utensils. One bowl left a rust spot in my kitchen sink as it sat overnight. Not sure how stainless rusts?! I have other SS bowls that are really old that look better then these do now. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Hanan

customer_reviews.title: No frills exact perfection for mixing bowls.
customer_reviews.text: These bowls are no frills perfection. Exact amount you need to make 2-3 complicated dishes in one night and classy enough to serve your family in. I adore these bowls. When I started to get into cooking I ordered 3 plastic bowls with a rubber rim bottom. Those were annoying because they would collect water in the dishwasher and then eventually the rubber rings on the bottom tore out.
customer_reviews.author: KMA & TKA

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Smallest bowl has a split on lip and some of the bowls are smeared with black stuff. Returned and purchased the Cuisinart three bowl set which feel better made and arrived better packaged and in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: hzn723

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty, beautiful bowls!
customer_reviews.text: Compared to the other many bowls, I found these to be the best ones! They feel heavy duty, very deep and narrow (don't take so much space to store), very comfortable to work with, have flat and stable bottom, and just beautiful. And a seller very responsible, great communication and great customer service. Will recommend to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: eduard katanov

customer_reviews.title: Not overly impressed, but may be okay.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how their production line is set up, but every one of these bowls were filthy. Apparently they are packed without being cleaned first. They all had black marks on the bottoms [inside and outside]. When I ran my hands over them, my hands turned black from the residue on each bowl - all over the bowl and especially under the rim. Hopefully they will clean up okay. They are lightweight so hoping they will be fairly durable. Not overly impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Rusting after using 2x.  Don't buy these.
customer_reviews.text: Editing my review. These aren't lightly used. They're *barely* used. See the rust? Save your money, keep shopping. They're light weight. I don't know why that would be a good thing, I like heavier gauge steel. these are hunky dory though, nest well and the size range is really great. I wish they had lids. I wish they were a little heavier.
customer_reviews.author: Sonoran Skies

customer_reviews.title: Nice, heavy duty bowl set
customer_reviews.text: I gave this bowl set for a wedding present and she loved it. Now her sister is getting married and when asked if her sister would like a set also, was met with an enthusiastic "YES". So now I have purchased 2 sets. I believe these women will get a lifetime of pleasure and use out of them. They stack nicely and look very durable. I would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Tammie J Arvila

customer_reviews.title: Space Saving
customer_reviews.text: A few of the bowls in this set arrived with some imperfections on the outer surface, but overall, I am pleased with the set itself. Recently moved and no longer have the cabinet space that I used to. These nesting bowls save space, and there's a size for every use I could possibly think of.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Liz

customer_reviews.title: Finally - a bowl for every occasion!
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with this set of lightweight but sturdy bowls! They are perfect for our needs (mixing batters and sauces, holding popcorn and chips, etc). They wash well by hand or the dishwasher. They do attract a lot of fingerprints on the inside because they are shiny like chrome inside, but they're for food, so who cares. Great value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Maximum Verbosity

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and easy to clean and separate
customer_reviews.text: We have been using these bowls now for 3 months in a house with 4 cooks and we all love these. Yes they get scratched but are easy to clean by hand or in the dishwasher. They are easy to separate and light weight. I got rid of all my other mixing bowls and I do not miss them at all.
customer_reviews.author: Sage

customer_reviews.title: Useful set, good value
customer_reviews.text: I like this set, which replaced an incomplete set of heavier bowls. If I need a heavier bowl I use my Pyrex. This set is lightweight and easy to clean and the variety of sizes included is excellent. Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: NikkiP

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, does the job, little thin.
customer_reviews.text: These aren't as thick or robust as top-quality stainless steel bowls, but for the price they do the job for most home cooks. The edges are easy to grip. They clean quickly and stack compactly. Keepers!
customer_reviews.author: Harold Summer

customer_reviews.title: very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: as some other reviewers mentioned scratches dents etc. I did not experience that . well made (somewhat thin) remember what you are paying for it. packed well. work well. they do scratch somewhat, but i use metal kitchen tools. too be expected. very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.author: capstick58

customer_reviews.title: light weight mixing bowls
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for the two biggest bowls, in helping me with mixing large batches. I am buying more love em easy to clean, easy to store, thank you for a quality product
customer_reviews.author: gregory hubert

customer_reviews.title: The nicest mixing bowls anywhere at any price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent mixing bowls...I have been searching for years for bowls like this...and now I have them....they almost blind you with shine...a must have for cooks or those that love to cook
customer_reviews.author: David Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Very usable but not heavy duty.
customer_reviews.text: Use these often. They are very lightweight and dingable, but they do the job and the many sizes are so handy.
customer_reviews.author: Culture Man

product_meta.title: ZESPROKA Stainless Steel Mixing Bowls, Nesting Bowls, Matte and Mirror Finish, Set of 6
feature_bullets: VERSATILE: Perfect for beating and mixing ingredients, tossing salads and serving soups
DURABLE MATERIALS: Made from durable and reliable stainless steel that will stay pristine and scratch-free for years
CLEVER DESIGN: The ingenious nesting design saves you space in your kitchen cupboards while the deepening basin design prevents accidental spills
EASY TO HOLD: Easy-to-grip rolled rims help you keep a hold of the bowl while you whisk, stir and mix
SET OF SIX: This set of six ensures you always have the right bowl for the job. Includes 1.59, 2.11, 2.85, 3.59, 4.65 and 5.5 quart bowls

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars342 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
